title: Helicopter Predictive Maintenance
description: A maintenance officer receives an alert from a helicopter's health and usage monitoring system (HUMS) predicting an impending gearbox failure.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the HUMS alert and review the specific sensor data indicating the fault.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly interprets the sensor data (e.g., vibration analysis).

tasks.description: Ground the helicopter immediately to prevent a catastrophic failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer issues a grounding order for the specific aircraft tail number.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the replacement of the gearbox and check spare parts inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer generates a work order and confirms a replacement part is available.
